text_block_list.text: It seems that Sakura Bakushin O's name is becoming more and more well known, partly due to the fact that she has recently been issued a victory suit.
Then, one day――

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Excuse me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya, a visitor?

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Hello! I'm the president of the Public Relations Committee.

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: I'm thinking of writing a feature article for next month's issue on Uma Musume who have recently received their victory suits.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So that means you're interviewing me!? You're interviewing me, aren't you!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And it's straight from the same kind of "president" as me… …Fufu, I simply can't not take this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's good, right, Trainer!?
It's certainly good to get more media exposure.
Sakura Bakushin O's peers were Rice Shower, Mihono Bourbon, and Nishino Flower.
In order not to be overshadowed by them, I want to actively promote her and raise her profile――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yaaay!! Allow me to tell you all about my fascinating appeal!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! We Uma Musume shine only when we run!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, then, let's head down to the track! Please do look upon me running in my victory suit!!
Sakura Bakushin O grabbed her victory suit and walked out alone.
I apologized to the chair of the public relations committee and the committee members behind me, and headed with them to the track in pursuit of Sakura Bakushin O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu-fu-fu! What do you think of my sharp, dignified victory uniform?

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Fantastic! And the cherry blossom motif suits you so well!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course it does, of course it does! Running'll make me shine even brighter!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Without further ado, I'm off!
choice_data_list: Go ahead and Bakushin to your heart's content!
Go ahead and Bakushin to your heart's content!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Dressed in my victory suit, I am precisely the One True・Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uooooooohhhh!! Please do gaze upon the power of my rebirthed self!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: What speed…! Without a doubt, my "Bakushin-like Dash" ――the fastest of the fast!
choice_data_list: That was one of the best runs I've ever seen!
That was one of the best runs I've ever seen!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, you are mistaken! My true power isn't like this at all!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Next time, even faster――Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: You're kidding!! I can't believe she's still getting faster…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, to push the limits even further―― Bakushin, Bakushiii―n…!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew… phew… Th, that's approximately it!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Member
text_block_list.text: Thanks to you, I got some great shots! Looks like you're going to have a great article, Miss President!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Yes! "Her speed is reminiscent of a legend's." That's the headline we'll do!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: That's it for us then. Thank you for your cooperation!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, it was nothign… Let's… again… sometime!
As soon as she said that, Sakura Bakushin O plopped down on the spot.
Apparently, her strength was already at its limit. It seems her endurance is still an issue.
Nevertheless, the article was well written, and it succeeded in raising the profile of Sakura Bakushin O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood, please do leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Without so much as a sliver of doubt, I'll show you all how I put 100% of my power and overflowing enthusiasm into it!!
They wanted to take pictures at the same time, so they decided to do the interview after Sakura Bakushin O had changed into her victory suit.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you kindly for waiting!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Fantastic! And the cherry blossom motif suits you so well!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufu. Of course it does, of course it does!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: I heard that it was Ms. Bakushin O's wish to include the cherry blossom motif?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! After all, I'm "Sakura" Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: From the day I was given this name, my destiny was set in stone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed, we must shine like cherry blossoms in full bloom and keep on Bakushin-ing on!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I can't think of a more appropriate motif to include in my victory suit than cherry blossoms!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll bloom both as a competitor and as class president!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the great episode. Thanks to you, it's looking like I'll be able to write some good stuff!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, it was nothing! Next, I'll tell you about the episode of the class president, which is an essential part of my story!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: What!? No, that's a story for another time――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Don't be so shy! I'll let you hear it all the way through!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――and so, this is how I began my journey as class president!

text_block_list.name: PR Committee Chair
text_block_list.text: I, is that so…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: From here on out, I will always be honest and righteous! As the class president, I'll keep on Bakushin-ing!!
…Thus ended the interview with Sakura Bakushin O.
The article was well written and succeeded in raising the profile of Sakura Bakushin O.
